entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 10:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 98.5 kPa
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Fog. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog developing late this evening becoming fog patches before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
